styles: div.comstyle-input-holder div.comstyle-input{position:absolute;display:block;top:.25rem;left:.5rem;bottom:.25rem;right:.5rem;border:thin solid #555}div.comstyle-input-holder div.comstyle-input input.comstyle-input{display:block;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;font-family:monospace;border:none;outline:0;font-size:.85rem;padding:0;margin:0;color:#eaeaea;overflow:hidden;background:#111}div.comstyle-input-holder div.comstyle-input input.comstyle-input:focus{color:#fff}:not(.noreset){font-family:primary;padding:0;margin:0;-webkit-user-select:none;-moz-user-select:none;-ms-user-select:none;user-select:none;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale;color:#eaeaea}.border-based-1{box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #eaeaea}.border-based-2{box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset silver}.border-based-3{box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #979797}.border-based-4{box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #555}.border-based-5{box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #333}.t-normal{font-size:.9rem;font-weight:400}.t-small{font-size:.8rem;font-weight:300}.t-medium{font-size:1rem;font-weight:500}.t-large{font-size:1.1rem;font-weight:600}.t-console{font-size:.8rem;line-height:.8rem;font-family:monospace}.small-icon-button{position:relative;display:inline-block;font-size:.8rem;color:#eaeaea;padding:.1rem .4rem;margin:0;cursor:default}.small-icon-button:hover{color:#979797}.small-button{position:relative;display:inline-block;font-size:.8rem;color:#eaeaea;padding:.25rem .4rem;margin:.25rem;cursor:default;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear,left bottom,left top,from(#555),to(#5f5f5f));background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#555,#5f5f5f);box-sizing:border-box;border:thin outset #555;border-radius:2px}.small-button:hover{color:#fff;background-image:-webkit-gradient(linear,left bottom,left top,from(#5f5f5f),to(#555));background-image:linear-gradient(0deg,#5f5f5f,#555)}::-webkit-scrollbar{width:8px;height:8px;background-color:#333}::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{border-radius:0;background-color:#555}::-webkit-scrollbar-corner{background-color:#333}p.row span{font-family:monospace;font-size:13px;font-variant-numeric:tabular-nums;padding:0;margin:0;line-height:16px;height:16px;max-height:16px;white-space:pre;vertical-align:top}p.row span.match{background:silver;color:#333;font-weight:600}:host{position:relative;display:inline-block;padding:0;margin:0;white-space:nowrap}:host span.wrapper{position:relative;display:inline-block;padding:0 8px;margin:0;white-space:nowrap;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis}:host span.wrapper span.column{position:relative;display:inline-block;font-family:monospace;font-size:13px;font-variant-numeric:tabular-nums;padding:0;margin:0;line-height:16px;height:16px;max-height:16px;white-space:pre;vertical-align:top}:host span.wrapper span.border{position:absolute;height:100%;width:2px;top:0;right:0;border-right:thin solid #555;cursor:col-resize;z-index:1}
